mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT (REPORT_NO, REPORTER_NO, REPORTED_NO, REPORT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_RPNO.NEXTVAL, #{reporterNo}, #{reportedNo}, #{reportContent}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT)
mapper.select:
SELECT R.*, A.ACCOUNT FROM REPORT R LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.REPORTED_NO = M.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN ACCOUNT A ON (A.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y'
AND
R.REPORTED_NO LIKE '${search}'
A.ACCOUNT LIKE '${search}'
ORDER BY R.CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(REPORTED_NO) AS "REPORT_COUNT" FROM REPORT WHERE REPORTED_NO = #{reportedNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT R LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.REPORTED_NO = M.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN ACCOUNT A ON (A.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y'
AND
R.REPORTED_NO LIKE '${search}'
A.ACCOUNT LIKE '${search}'
